refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions>
</CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ksmps = 64 0dbfs = 1 nchnls = 2
instr 1 kcnt init 0 ifftsize = 2048 ihop = ifftsize/4
a1 diskin2 "beats.wav", 1, 0, 1 a1 = a1*0.5 fsig1 pvsanal a1, ifftsize, ihop, ifftsize, 1 ih, kt pvsbuffer fsig1, 10
fsig2 pvsbufread2 kt, ih, 1, 1 fsig3 pvsbufread2 kt, ih, 2, 2
a2 pvsynth fsig3 a3 pvsynth fsig2
outs a2, a3 endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 2048 -7 0 128 1.1 128 0.5 256 1.8 512 1.1 1024 0.1 f2 0 2048 -7 1 128 0.2 128 0.05 256 0.5 512 0.9 1024 0.1
i1 0 60 </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
